meanings.definition: The area along the edge of a lake.
meanings.sent1: Families enjoyed picnics by the lakesides.
meanings.sent2: Birds often gather near lakesides to drink water.

meanings.sent4: The beauty of the lakesides was like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The sunsets at the lakesides painted the sky in vibrant colors.
